description: Your goal in Castle Come is to build your castle, which is essentially a giant walking mech, and make it strong enough so that it can breach the gate. You'll need to scavenge and rebuild your mobile castle as it takes damage from attackers along the way. You'll start small before eventually recruiting a larger crew and building yourself into a giant, intimidating fortress on two (or more) legs.
title: Castle Come Announced, Where You Are a Literal Walking Fortress
